description: The department of national defence has a requirement for the supply of heavy trailers
full_summary:
# Heavy Trailers Request for Supply Arrangement

### Request for Supply Arrangement Number
E60HP-19TRLR

### Contracting Authority
The Department of National Defence, National Defence Headquarters, 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada, K1A 0K2

### Description
The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the supply of heavy trailers, including Group 1B, 3B, and 3C, and related items. This request for supply arrangement is open to suppliers holding a supply arrangement under the request for supply arrangement E60HP-19TRLR.

### Key Dates
* Tender Closing Date: 2024-02-16
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2024-03-15
* Expected Contract End Date: 2024-12-31
* Delivery Date: on or before 180 days after contract execution

### Important Information
* The requested goods must be delivered to Canada.
* Suppliers must hold a supply arrangement under the request for supply arrangement E60HP-19TRLR to be considered for this opportunity.
* The procurement is not subject to security requirements.
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

### Trade Agreements
This procurement is governed by the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

### Contact Information
For any inquiries or questions, please contact Genevieve Roach at genevieve.roach@forces.gc.ca.

---
